title: Shapeshifter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, choose 1 of 5 roles to turn into at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The host will give you 5 roles at the start of every day, and you pick one to transform into. You will gain all of that roles abilities, attributes (not including access to factional kills or factional chats), and attack/defense values.
- You will keep Shapeshifter's win condition, and you will revert back to Shapeshifter at the start of the day. You keep this attribute whenever you shift info another role.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the good faction lose (this can win while dead).

desc:
Post 431
*Taking the form of others to obtain their goal, that is the way of the Shapeshifters.*
